com.lehman.ic9.sys

Class thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.lehman.ic9.sys.thread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class thread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread class extends the Java Thread class and implements custom functionality for IC9.
    Author:
    Austin Lehman
